fs.exist(path) ¶

Checks if a file exist

Checks if a path is a directory

Creates a directory

Deletes a file

Copies a file

fs.move(pathFrom, pathTo) ¶

Moves a file

fs.files(path) ¶

Give you a list of all files in a directory

Give you a list of all directories in a directory
